name: Lagrant Communications
description:
LAGRANT COMMUNICATIONS is an integrated marketing communications firm with demonstrated expertise in advertising, marketing and public relations services targeting African American and Latino consumer markets. We are headquartered in Los Angeles, with offices in Dallas and New York. For twenty-two years, our relentless passion for innovative communications has created dozens of award-winning campaigns for globally recognized brands targeting diverse audiences.
We understand the dynamics of cultural awareness and we are committed to representing our clients with comprehensive and engaging plans that yield maximum results.
